channel.title: Travis on Fred's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Travis on Fred's blog

item.title: Make Blog Posting as a Simple Continuous Delivery.
item.description: 1. Continuous Delivery. What is CD? Please look into Wiki CD. We can see our blog posting as a delivery every time we push our repo to GitHub, which can be used as CI/CD process. Well, Let me describe it simpler. Do you remember that I need to run hugo -d ./docs each time I doing my posting? This command means generating code from your local repo by Hugo. Only “docs” directory will be used as your website.
